name: Tube is cut by suitable means, ends are deburred & cleaned of any filings, and surfaces prepared with light grade emery paper.
Joint fit has correct clearance and expanded end of tube (if applicable) is to correct length for pipe size
Heat from Oxy Acetylene torch is being applied uniformly to the fitting, and torch flame is slightly reducing/carburising.
Silfos used is 15% and is being applied so that through capillary action is achieved around the entire joint.
Shoulder build-up of Sipfos is just present around the entire circumference of the brazed joint, and completed joint is left to air cool.
